message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of this amazing product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $7,500.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am currently working within a budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $6,800 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're working within a budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $7,200.
